Verses: 1 baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Baabilonukkuk Konduponavargalukkulle, Siraiyiruppilirundhu Erusalemukkum Yoodhaavilulla Thangal Thangal Pattanangalukkum,

2 serubaabel, Yesuvaa, Negemiyaa, Seraayaa, Relaayaa, Mordhegaai, Pilsaan, Mispaar, Pikvaai, Rekoom, Paanaa Enbavargalodekooda Thirumbivandha Dhesaththup Puththiraraagiya Isravel Janamaana Manidharin Thogaiyaavadhu:
3 paaroshin Puththirar Irandaayiraththu Nootru Ezhubaththiranduper.
4 sepaththiyaavin Puththirar Munnootru Ezhubaththiranduper.
5 aaraagin Puththirar Ezhunootru Ezhubaththaindhuper.
6 yesuvaa Yovaab Enbavargaludaiya Sandhadhikkullirundha Paagaadh Movaabin Puththirar Irandaayiraththu Ennootrup Panniranduper.
7 elaamin Puththirar Aayiraththu Irunootru Aimbaththu Naanguper.
8 saththoovin Puththirar Tholaayiraththu Naarpaththaindhuper.
9 sakkaayin Puththirar Ezhunootru Arubadhuper.
10 paaniyin Puththirar Arunootru Naarpaththiranduper.
11 pebaayin Puththirar Arunootru Irubaththumoondruper.
12 askaadhin Puththirar Aayiraththuirunootru Irubaththiranduper.
13 adhonigaamin Puththirar Arunootru Arubaththaaruper.
14 pikvaayin Puththirar Irandaayiraththu Aimbaththaaruper.
15 aadheenin Puththirar Naanootru Aimbaththu Naanguper.
16 esekkiyaavin Sandhadhiyaana Adherin Puththirar Thonnootrettupper.
17 pesaayin Puththirar Munnootru Irubaththumoondruper.
18 yorogin Puththirar Nootruppanniranduper.
19 aasoomin Puththirar Irunootru Irubaththumoondruper.
20 kipaarin Puththirar Thonnootraindhuper.
21 bethlagemin Puththirar Nootrirubaththumundruper.
22 neththobaavin Manidhar Aimbaththaaruper.
23 aanadhoththin Manidhar Nootrirubaththettupper.
24 asmaaveththin Puththirar Naarpaththiranduper.
25 keeriyaadhyaareem, Kepiraa, Perodh Enbavaigalin Puththirar Ezhunootru Naarpaththumoondruper.
26 raamaa, Kaabaa Enbavaigalin Puththirar Arunootru Irubaththoruper.
27 mikmaasin Manidhar Nootrirubaththiranduper.
28 beththel, Aayi Enbavaigalin Manidhar Irunootru Irubaththumoondruper.
29 nepovin Puththirar Aimbaththiranduper.
30 makpeeshin Puththirar Nootraimbaththaaruper.
31 matra Elaamin Puththirar Aayiraththu Irunootru Aimbaththu Naanguper.
32 aareemin Puththirar Munnootru Irubadhuper.
33 lodh, Aadheedh, Ono Enbavaigalin Puththirar Ezhunootru Irubaththaindhuper.
34 erigovin Puththirar Munnootrunaarpaththaindhuper.
35 senaagin Puththirar Moovaayiraththuarunootru Muppadhuper.
36 aasaariyaraanavargal Yesuvaavin Kudumbaththaanaagiya Yedhaayaavin Puththirar Tholaayiraththu Ezhubaththumoondruper.
37 immerin Puththirar Aayiraththu Aimbaththiranduper.
38 paskoorin Puththirar Aayiraththuirunootru Naarpaththezhuper.
39 aareemin Puththirar Aayiraththuppadhinezhuper.
40 leviyaraanavargal: Odhaayaavin Sandhadhiyaana Yesuvaa Kadhmiyel Enbavargalin Puththirar Ezhubaththu Naanguper.
41 paadagargalaanavargal: Aasaabin Puththirar Nootrirubaththettupper.

42 vaasal Kaavalaalarin Puththiraraanavargal: Salloomin Puththirarum, Adherin Puththirarum, Thalmonin Puththirarum, Akkoopin Puththirarum, Adhidhaavin Puththirarum, Sobaayin Puththirarumaanavargalellaarum Nootrumuppaththonbadhuper.
43 nidhaneemiyaraanavargal: Seegaavin Puththirar, Asubaavin Puththirar, Thabaa Koththin Puththirar,
44 kerosin Puththirar, Seeyaagaavin Puththirar, Paadhonin Puththirar,
45 lebaanaagin Puththirar, Akaabaavin Puththirar, Akkoopin Puththirar,
46 aagaabin Puththirar, Salmaayin Puththirar, Aanaanin Puththirar,
47 kiththelin Puththirar, Kaagaarin Puththirar, Raayaagin Puththirar,
48 redhseenin Puththirar, Negodhaavin Puththirar, Kaasaamin Puththirar,
49 oosaavin Puththirar, Paaseyogin Puththirar, Pesaayin Puththirar,
50 asnaavin Puththirar, Meyooneemin Puththirar, Nebuseemin Puththirar,
51 pakpookkin Puththirar, Agubaavin Puththirar, Arkoorin Puththirar,
52 pasloodhin Puththirar, Megidhaavin Puththirar, Arshaavin Puththirar,
53 parkosin Puththirar, Siseraavin Puththirar, Thaamaavin Puththirar,
54 nedhsiyaavin Puththirar, Adhibaavin Puththirarume.
55 saalomonudaiya Velaiyaatkalin Puththiraraanavargal: Sodhaayin Puththirar, Sopereththin Puththirar, Perudhaavin Puththirar,
56 yaalaagin Puththirar, Tharkonin Puththirar, Kiththelin Puththirar,
57 sepaththiyaavin Puththirar, Aththeelin Puththirar, Sebaayeemilulla Pokereththin Puththirar, Aamiyin Puththirarume.
58 nidhaneemiyarum Saalomonudaiya Velaiyaatkalin Puththirarum Ellaarum Munnootruth Thonnootriranduper.

59 thelmelaagilum, Thelarsaavilum, Kerupilum, Aadhonilum, Immerilumirundhu Vandhu, Thaangal Isravelar Endru Thangal Pidhaakkalin Vamsaththaiyum, Thangal Poorvoththaraththaiyum Sollamaattaamal Irundhavargal:
60 thelaayaavin Puththirar, Thobiyaavin Puththirar, Negodhaavin Puththirar, Aaga Arunootru Aimbaththiranduper.

61 aasaariyarin Puththiraril Abaayaavin Puththirar, Kosin Puththirar, Keeleyaaththiyanaana Parsilaayin Kumaaraththigalil Oruththiyai Vivaagampanni, Avargal Vamsa Naamam Tharikkappatta Parsillaayin Puththirare.
62 ivargal Thangal Vamsa Attavanaiyaith Thedi, Adhaik Kaanaamarpoi, Aasaariya Oozhiyaththirku Vilakkamaanavargal Endru Ennappattaargal.
63 ooreem Thummeem Enbavaigalulla Oru Aasaariyan Ezhumbumattum, Ivargal Magaa Parisuththamaanadhile Pusikkaththagaadhendru Thirshaadhaa Avargalukku Sonnaan.
64 sabaiyaar Ellaarum Egaththirku Naarpaththeeraayiraththu Munnootru Arubadhuperaayirundhaargal.
65 avargalaiththavira Ezhaayiraththumunnootru Muppaththezhuperaana Avargaludaiya Velaikkaararum Velaikkaarigalum, Irunooru Paadagarum Paadagigalum Avargalukku Irundhaargal.
66 avargaludaiya Kudhiraigal Ezhunootru Muppaththaaru, Avargaludaiya Koveru Kazhudhaigal Irunootrunaarpaththaindhu,
67 avargaludaiya Ottagangal Naanootru Muppaththaindhu, Kazhudhaigal Aaraayiraththu Ezhunootru Irubadhu.
68 vamsangalin Thalaivar
